<1>

Deposit plain stablecoins or tokens - DAI/USDC/USDT/TUSD/BUSD/sUSD/LINK/YFI - which will get converted underneath to cTokens for compound pools, aTokens for aave pools or xyzTokens for others pools.

<2>

After depositing in the pool, you receive liquidity provider (LP) tokens. They represent your share of ownership in the pool.

<3>

By providing liquidity on any of the 88mph pools, you earn upfront MPH LP reward tokens.

<4>

By staking your MPH, you can claim your share of rewards from the 88mph's reward pool where all the liquidity mining and system rewards are collected.

<5>

When your lending period is over, you withdraw your principal with the fixed-rate interest earned during the period of lending. When you want to withdraw, you need to repay 90% of the initial MPH tokens received at the time of deposit.

How much would you like to stake?

If you stake your MPH, you are eligible to collect two kinds of rewards: 88mph fees, and incentives like governance tokens or LP rewards harvested by the 88mph pools on external protocols (COMP, CRV, etc).

Stake your MPH tokens to earn your rewards

If you stake your MPH, you are eligible to collect two kinds of rewards: 88mph fees, and incentives like governance tokens or LP rewards harvested by the 88mph pools on external protocols (COMP, CRV, etc). See how it works.
